subject: Clutch pedal noise
description_text:
Hello,
 i recently got your Plus X pedals, i love them, but my clutch is making
weird noise when using.
I tried to lubricate every moving part i could but nothing helpen. I
attached video of that squaking sound, i dont really know where its coming
from.
Thanks for any upcoming help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomáš Skovajsa,  Please rotate the yellow spring slightly; it may be catching on the left steel plate after compression.

Hello, that didn't helped. It starts to make noise just as the back part
starts tilting upwards. Attaching another video so you see and hear it
better.

pá 2. 1. 2026 v 4:29 odesílatel support@simsonn.com

Hi Tomáš Skovajsa,     You can apply lubrication maintenance to these areas; some recommended lubrication points are also mentioned in the manual. Please check these points first, as any noise usually comes from one of these areas.
